Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.controller.teacher

Class QuestionManageController

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.controller.ControllerBase
comp3111.examsystem.controller.teacher.QuestionManageController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class QuestionManageController extends ControllerBase implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
Controller class for managing questions in the teacher's view of the exam system.
